DOC.brief_summary: This open label extension study give opportunity participant respond treatment Pegylated-Interferon Alfa-2a ( Pegasys ) Recombinant Interferon Alfa-2a ( Roferon-A® ) prior clinical study NO15753 ( NCT00003542 ) Renal Cell Carcinoma ( RCC ) , NO15764 ( NCT number available ) NO16006 ( NCT02736721 ) Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia ( CML ) , NO16007 ( NCT number available ) Malignant Melanoma ( MM ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Continued Treatment Among Participants Who Have Responded Peginterferon Alfa-2a ( Pegasys® ) Recombinant Interferon Alfa-2a ( Roferon-A® ) Prior Clinical Studies
DOC.criteria: Participants must complete protocol NO15753 , NO15764 , NO16006 NO16007 respond treatment end trial define parent protocol CML participant must confirm cytogenetic complete response within 2 month enter extension study . MM RCC participant must tumour assessment verify stable good response within 2 month enter extension study Pregnant lactate woman Refusal use adequate contraceptive measure among men woman childbearing potential
